statements: UPDATE supplier_performance_metrics SET metric_value = 10 WHERE metric_id = 1;

UPDATE supplier_performance_metrics SET metric_description = 'Above average performance' WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND metric_id = 2;

UPDATE DeliveryMetrics SET on_time = true WHERE delivery_id = 201;
